# Yari of Air (Spell)
## Overview
[[Evocation Spells|Evocation]] \[[[Air Spells|air]]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Shugenja Spells|Shugenja 2]] (Air)

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 4th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 4]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** Touch

**Effect:** Yari-like beam

**Duration:** 1 minute/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Oriental Adventures (Wotc), pg. 120

A 6-foot-long shaft formed of air springs forth from your hands. You wield this shaft as if it were a yari (shortspear). Attacks with the *yari of air* are regular melee attacks. The yari deals 1d8 points of damage +1 point per two caster levels (maximum +10). The yari is considered a +1 weapon for purposes of overcoming damage reduction.
